name: Vidhika Gupta

experience.title: Human Resources Intern
experience.description: •	Scanned 5000+ resumes to create a robust talent pipeline of 2000+ candidates across 50+ job openings; covered multiple functional domains including developers (JAVA, .Net, Python, Android, Front end), Finance, SAP etc.•	Assessed multiple job descriptions and identified keywords for funneling and generating candidate pool•	Worked on recruitment portals (Naukri.com) and used Boolean, Keyword search for sourcing candidates

experience.title: Management Trainee
experience.description: •	Formulated engagement strategy by partnering with marketing manager; initiated 2 social media campaigns on Facebook and WhatsApp; increased product visibility and overall customer engagement•	Managed an employee base of 150+ (Blue and White collar) and executed multiple daily operations issue redressal, quarterly reviews, annual promotions, employee engagement programs etc.•	Interacted with customers to resolve their queries and improve the overall buying experience

experience.title: Assistant System Engineer
experience.description: •	Delivered complex and time critical enhancement and change requests for large clients like GE Power & Water, Standard Chartered Bank•	Developed 110+ exhaustive test cases for more than 10 business scenarios and implemented 1000+ test cases to ensure defect free product•	Mentored junior members, campus joiners and delivered KT sessions on various project modules•	Led a team of 6 people, supervised performance and ensured timely completion of the project•	Honored with client appreciation for exceptional client service; Won TCS LIREL award for upholding integrity and ensuring positive work environment in team

education.title: UCD Michael Smurfit Graduate Business School
education.description: Activities and Societies: Member of International Students Society • Completed masters with 1:1 distinction • Developed a management development plan for a hypothetical company as part of the HR Project • Worked on multiple marketing projects; Developed a detailed marketing plan for launching plant based ready-made meals in Irish and UK market; Analyzed consumer behavior using theory of choice, usage • Analyzed balance sheet, cash flow statement and income statement using complex accounting ratios; Analyzed stock market for Walt Disney and advised… Show more

education.title: NCU (THE NORTHCAP UNIVERSITY)
education.description: Activities and Societies: Microsoft Tech Club (Design and Creative team), e-Governance cell (Team member), College Tech Fest(Coordinator), College Cultural Fest(Design team) • Awarded Silver Medal for securing 2nd rank (out of 180 students) in the CSE department • Honored with excellence scholarship (3 consecutive years) for outstanding academic achievement • Published and presented a research paper on 'ICT: it's a Coeval Technology' at an international conference on ACSITEET 2013 • Managed design team for Microsoft Tech Club (University chapter) in 2014 and 2015 • Coordinated design activities in Momentum ’12 (Cultural fest) and Cerebration ’14 (Tech… Show more
